name: Mount Overlay
description: Mount a component in overlay mode (modal or fullscreen) for immersive, focused experiences. This is a streaming UI tool that displays content above all other UI elements. Use this for: image galleries with lightbox, PDF previews, error traces, focused workflows, critical alerts, or any content that demands full attention. Supports dismissable modals or locked fullscreen modes. Combine with update_theme for mood-enhanced immersive experiences.

componentId.description: Component to mount in overlay (e.g., 'vision:image-gallery', 'document:pdf-preview', 'debug:error-trace-explorer'). Must be registered component.

mode.description: 'modal' shows component in centered dialog with backdrop (dismissable by default). 'fullscreen' covers entire viewport (immersive, requires explicit close).

size.description: Modal size (ignored for fullscreen). 'small' (400px), 'medium' (600px), 'large' (800px), 'xlarge' (1200px), 'auto' (fits content). Default: 'medium'.

dismissable.description: Allow user to close overlay by clicking backdrop or ESC key. Default: true for modal, false for fullscreen.

props.description: Props to pass to the component. Must match component's prop schema.

backdrop.description: Backdrop style. 'blur' (default, frosted glass), 'dark' (80% black), 'light' (80% white), 'transparent' (no backdrop).

animate.description: Enable entrance/exit animations (fade + scale). Default: true.
